title: Save on Outdoor Gear at the Backcountry Memorial Day Weekend Sale
content:
Quality biking gear is an investment. But you don’t have to break the bank to outfit your adventures. Instead, add to your gear closet the smart way, with deals from the Backcountry Memorial Day Sale running May 16–26.

As a one-stop shop for all types of outdoor gear, Backcountry carries top-rated products from some of the best brands in the business. From big-ticket items like bikes and tech to staples, including outerwear, shoes, and accessories, the sale is a prime opportunity to pick up gear that’s been on your wishlist or treat yourself to a purchase from your favorite brands.

Keep reading to see some of the best deals available in the sale. Or head to Backcountry.com to browse the sale by category:

  • Men’s Apparel
  • Women’s Apparel
  • Biking Gear
  • Camping Gear
  • Kids’ Gear
  • Travel
Shop the Memorial Day Sale

Bikes on Sale at Backcountry.com

Pivot Mach 6 Brunch Ride MX Mountain Bike: $3,299 (34% Off)

Go big and ride hard with the Pivot Mach 6 Brunch Ride MX. This mixed-wheel enduro machine blends speed, control, and playful handling for riding steep descents and big hits. The carbon frame, paired with a Marzocchi Bomber Z1 fork and Bomber CR coil shock, offers a plush, coil-sprung ride that shines on rowdy terrain. The mullet setup combines a 29-inch front wheel for rollover confidence with a 27.5-inch rear for quick, responsive handling through tight corners and technical sections. Shimano’s SLX/XT 12-speed drivetrain ensures crisp shifting, while SRAM 4-piston brakes deliver reliable stopping power when things get steep. Maxxis Assegai tires and DT Swiss M1900 wheels provide grip and durability for the roughest lines.

Santa Cruz Bicycles Tallboy Carbon C X01 Eagle AXS Reserve Mountain Bike: $5,135 (35% Off)

Whether you’re chasing PRs on local trails or linking up backcountry loops, the Santa Cruz Tallboy Carbon C X01 Eagle AXS Reserve offers a smooth, fast ride with full control. Speed, precision, and top-tier technology — this trail bike delivers on every front. The bike features a lightweight yet stiff Carbon C frame, paired with Santa Cruz’s efficient VPP suspension to offer 120mm of responsive rear travel. A 130mm FOX 34 fork lets riders handle technical descents with confidence and stay nimble on climbs. The SRAM X01 Eagle AXS wireless drivetrain ensures clean, instant shifting without the clutter of cables, and Reserve 30|SL carbon wheels reduce weight while boosting durability. Maxxis Forekaster tires offer dependable grip in varied conditions, while SRAM G2 RSC brakes provide powerful stopping control.

Yeti Cycles SB140 C2 GX Eagle Mountain Bike: $4,200 (30% Off)

Designed for riders who crave speed, control, and playfulness on demanding terrain, the Yeti Cycles SB140 C2 GX Eagle is the ultimate trail companion. Its C-Series carbon frame is paired with Yeti’s Switch Infinity suspension system, offering 140mm of plush, efficient rear travel that thrives on technical climbs and rugged descents. A 150mm Fox Performance 36 fork up front keeps things composed over big hits, while the SRAM GX Eagle drivetrain delivers crisp shifting and a wide gear range for tackling any ascent. Crankbrothers Synthesis Enduro wheels wrapped in Maxxis Aggressor tires ensure confident traction, and SRAM G2 R brakes provide powerful, consistent stopping. From high-alpine singletrack to rowdy enduro lines, the SB140 keeps the ride fast and fun.

Biking Accessories on Sale at Backcountry.com

Yakima GateKeeper Tailgate Pad: Starting at $15.63 (Up to 24% Off)

The Yakima GateKeeper Tailgate Pad is a durable, secure solution for shuttling bikes during mountain laps or trail days with friends. Built with a tough nylon exterior to resist weather and abrasion, the pad features a soft felt backing that protects your truck’s paint. SitTight cradles keep bikes stable and separated, reducing side-to-side movement on bumpy roads. The HindSight cover easily tucks away to maintain visibility with backup cameras. Transport up to five bikes with the medium model or up to six bikes with the large model.

DAKINE Hot Laps 2L Hip Pack: Starting at $27.50 (Up to 50% Off)

For easier days on singletrack loops, the Dakine Hot Laps 2L Hip Pack has organizers just right to hold tools, accessories, snacks, and a water bottle. It’s made mostly from hearty fabric to hold up to abuse, but the back panel is an air mesh for breathability. There’s also a separate fleece-lined phone pocket.

Shop Now Shop All Dakine Deals

NEMO Helio LX Pressure Shower: $103.97 (35% Off)

Rinse your ride off after a day of fun with this efficient and portable pressure shower. The lightweight and small design makes it easy to bring along and stash when not in use. Let the black 5.8-gallon reservoir warm water in the sun. Then, use the pump for seven to ten minutes of continuous water pressure. A seven-foot hose gives you flexibility to move the water stream around, so you can reach all the dirt and mud you’ve accumulated on the trail.

Biking Apparel at Backcountry.com

Men’s & Women’s Backcountry Slickrock 9” Bike Short: Starting at $24.75 (Up to 75% Off)

Inspired by the sandstone trails of the Southwest, the Backcountry Slickrock 9″ Shorts are built for hot-weather rides where freedom of movement and comfort are key. Made with lightweight, 4-way stretch recycled fabric, the shorts wick moisture and dry quickly. Laser-cut thigh vents provide added airflow on grueling climbs. The close-to-the-body fit reduces saddle snags, while the articulated hips and high-rise back offer comfort and coverage in an aggressive riding position. A DWR finish helps repel water, mud, and dust, while the UPF 50+ fabric protects from the sun’s harmful rays. An integrated belt with a waistband gripper keeps everything securely in place from trail to town.

Men’s & Women’s Backcountry Slickrock Short Sleeve Button-Up Jersey: Starting at $31.15 (Up to 65% Off)

The Backcountry Sliderock Short Sleeve Button-Up Jersey blends trail-ready performance with casual style for seamless transitions from singletrack to post-ride hangouts. Made from lightweight, breathable polyester, it wicks moisture and dries quickly to keep you cool and comfortable during warm-weather rides. The stretchy, relaxed fit allows freedom of movement, while thoughtful features like a drop hem for coverage, a zippered back pocket, a built-in sunglasses wipe, reflective details, and UPF 30+ protection add function and safety.
